Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Wizard Skills: Skill Trained (Arcana; Choose 5 from any)
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Experienced Professional: A critical failure when using Lore to Earn Income becomes a normal failure, and a normal failure gives twice normal income
Legendary Professional: NPCs' successful DC 10 Society check to Recall Knowledge improves their attitude by 1 step/Lore to Earn Income increases job level
Student Of The Canon: All critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Cannot fail to Recall Knowledge about own faith
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failure on any trained Lore check is a normal failure

Hit Points: 22 Armor Class: 15 (dexterity; trained)

Spells:
Invisibility Cloak
Warped Terrain
Magic Notes:
Arcane School: Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Illusion: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Warped Terrain spell
Arcane Bond: May use Drain Bonded Item to cast an expended spell using power stored in a possession 1/day
Arcane Spellcasting: May learn spells from the arcane tradition
Illusion: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Illusion spell
Widen Spell: May increase the effect of a 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', and the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Notes
Validation Errors:
Legendary Professional Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15 and lore rank (currently 2) >= 4
